mapper.select: SELECT g.id, anime_id, seller_id, u.nickname as sellerNickName, category ,title, description, start_price, instant_buy_price, auction_status, g.created_at, auction_end_at, (SELECT count(*) FROM wishlist WHERE goods_id = g.id) as wishCount FROM goods g INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = g.seller_id WHERE g.id = #{id};
